LUKE 20.29 sibun nu broþrjus wesun, jah sa frumista nimands qen gadauþnoda unbarnahs.
LUKE 20.30 jah nam anþar þo qen, jah sa gaswalt unbarnahs.
LUKE 20.31 jah þridja nam þo samaleiko;
samaleiko þan jah þai sibun, jah ni biliþun barne jah gaswultun.
LUKE 20.32 Spedista allaize gadauþnoda jah so qens.
LUKE 20.33 in þizai usstassai nu, ƕarjis þize wairþiþ qens?
þai auk sibun aihtedun þo du qenai.
LUKE 20.34 jah andhafjands qaþ du im Iesus:
þai sunjus þis aiwis liugand jah liuganda;
LUKE 20.35 iþ þaiei wairþai sind jainis aiwis niutan jah usstassais us dauþaim, ni liugand ni liuganda;
LUKE 20.36 nih allis gaswiltan þanaseiþs magun, ibnans aggilum auk sind jah sunjus sind gudis, usstassais sunjus wisandans.
LUKE 20.37 aþþan þatei urreisand dauþans, jah Moses bandwida ana aiƕatundjai, swe qiþiþ:
saƕ fraujan guþ Abrahamis jah guþ Isakis jah guþ Iakobis.
LUKE 20.38 aþþan guþ nist dauþaize, ak qiwaize;
LUKE 20.39 andhafjandans þan sumai þize bokarje qeþun:
LUKE 20.40 niþþan þanaseiþs gadaurstedun fraihnan ina ni waihtais.
ƕaiwa qiþand Xristu sunu Daweidis wisan?
LUKE 20.42 jah silba Daweid qiþiþ in bokom psalmono:
sit af taihswon meinai, LUKE 20.43 unte ik galagja fijands þeinans fotubaurd fotiwe þeinaize.
LUKE 20.44 Daweid ina fraujan haitiþ, jah ƕaiwa sunus imma ist?
LUKE 20.45 at gahausjandein þan allai managein qaþ du siponjam seinaim:
LUKE 20.46 atsaiƕiþ faura bokarjam þaim wiljandam gaggan in ƕeitaim...
...JOHN 5.45 þatei ik wrohidedjau izwis du attin;
ist saei wrohida izwis, Moses, du þammei jus weneiþ.
JOHN 5.46 jabai allis Mose galaubidedeiþ, ga-laubidedeiþ-þau-mis;
JOHN 5.47 þande nu jainis melam ni galaubeiþ, ƕaiwa meinaim waurdam galaubjaiþ?
JOHN 6.1 Afar þata galaiþ Iesus ufar marein þo Galeilaie jah Tibairiade.
JOHN 6.2 jah laistida ina manageins filu, unte gaseƕun taiknins þozei gatawida bi siukaim.
JOHN 6.3 usiddja þan ana fairguni Iesus jah jainar gasat miþ siponjam seinaim.
JOHN 6.4 wasuh þan neƕa pasxa, so dulþs Iudaie.
JOHN 6.5 þaruh ushof augona Iesus jah gaumida þammei manageins filu iddja du imma, qaþuh du Filippau:
ƕaþro bugjam hlaibans, ei matjaina þai?
JOHN 6.6 þatuh þan qaþ fraisands ina;
iþ silba wissa þatei habaida taujan.
twaim hundam skatte hlaibos ni ganohai sind þaim, þei nimai ƕarjizuh leitil.
JOHN 6.8 qaþ ains þize siponje is, Andraias, broþar Paitraus Seimonaus:
JOHN 6.9 ist magula ains her, saei habaiþ ·e· hlaibans barizeinans jah ·b· fiskans;
akei þata ƕa ist du swa managaim?
wasuh þan hawi manag ana þamma stada.
þaruh anakumbidedun wairos raþjon swaswe fimf þusundjos.
JOHN 6.11 namuh þan þans hlaibans Iesus jah awiliudonds gadailida þaim anakumbjandam; samaleiko jah þize fiske, swa filu swe wildedun.
JOHN 6.12 þanuh, biþe sadai waurþun, qaþ du siponjam seinaim:
galisiþ þos aflifnandeins drauhsnos, þei waihtai ni fraqistnai.
JOHN 6.13 þanuh galesun jah gafullidedun ·ib· tainjons gabruko us fimf hlaibam þaim barizeinam, þatei aflifnoda þaim matjandam.
JOHN 6.14 þaruh þai mans gasaiƕandans þoei gatawida taikn Iesus, qeþun þatei
sa ist bi sunjai praufetus sa qimanda in þo manaseþ.
JOHN 6.15 iþ Iesus kunnands þatei munaidedun usgaggan jah wilwan ina ei tawidedeina ina du þiudana, afiddja aftra in fairguni is ains.
